title: Ep: 036 - Art Consulting and Curating - Martha Weidmann
description:
In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Martha Weidmann, CEO and Co-Founder of NINE dot ARTS. 

NINE dot ARTS uses the power of original art to transform spaces into experiences. They bridge the gap between arts and business. With knowledge and experience they curate inspiring art collections that show beauty, creativity, and purpose.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
